* Tremmer exited the Maximal city in robot mode and breathed a sigh, the 
scents of the wild surrounding feeling much more natural then the armor 
plates that seemed to close in on his sightless self.  But duty called to a 
commander he had never met but was sure was noble, walking in her general 
direction. The scents of others coming to him as he neared.*

" Ya called?"

* He asked as he came up beside the armored figure, sensing that there was 
something alittle different about THIS transformer. Chemical trails unable 
to be seen by the unaided eyes painting a perfect picture within his 
programs.
Different indeed.
But Iron Raptor nodded, turning her attention towards the crew she had 
called to arms.*

" I'm glad you're all here."

* She gestured towards the charred ground exactly under her feet.*

" Tell me what you all see...or sense."

* Tremmer could only smile at the addition the maximal commander had added 
to her vocabularly for his benifit before pointing his snout down at the 
ground.*

" Earth."

* He answered bluntly.
Iron Raptor smiled, turning her attention towards Hot Spot and his gathered 
minions.*

" And You?"
